meanings.definition: In a skilled or proficient manner characteristic of a craftsman.
meanings.sent1: He worked craftsmanly on the intricate wood carving, showing great skill and precision.
meanings.sent2: She sewed the dress craftsmanly, paying attention to every detail.
meanings.sent3: The chef whisked the eggs craftsmanly, as if each egg had a tiny hat and cane.
meanings.sent4: The musician played the piano craftsmanly, his fingers dancing across the keys with expertise.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the portrait craftsmanly, capturing every detail flawlessly.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the work or skills of a craftsman.
meanings.sent1: The craftsmanly tools were carefully organized in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: She admired the craftsmanly details of the hand-carved furniture.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked with a craftsmanly swagger, as if it had just built a tiny house.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a craftsmanly palette of colors.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a craftsmanly masterpiece, each flower placed with care and artistry.
